name: copilot-terminal-monitor
description: Monitors terminal commands and notifies if no output is received for a specified duration.

terminalIdleMonitor.enabled.description: Enable or disable terminal idle monitoring.

terminalIdleMonitor.idleTimeout.description: Time in seconds before notifying about an idle terminal.

terminalIdleMonitor.totalTimeout.description: Time in minutes before notifying about total execution time.

terminalIdleMonitor.statusBarAlwaysVisib.description: Keep the status bar item visible even when no command is running.

terminalIdleMonitor.displayIdleText.description: Show 'Idle' text in the status bar when no command is running.

terminalIdleMonitor.statusBarAlignment.description: The alignment of the status bar item.

terminalIdleMonitor.obnoxiousMode.description: Enable high-intensity alerts (modal popups and flashing UI).

terminalIdleMonitor.obnoxiousColor.description: The color to use for flashing the UI in obnoxious mode.

terminalIdleMonitor.obnoxiousModeTime.description: The time in seconds when obnoxious mode triggers. Defaults to blank which uses the idle timeout.

terminalIdleMonitor.obnoxiousSnooze.description: If enabled, snoozing a notification will make the next alert obnoxious.

terminalIdleMonitor.obnoxiousPerWindow.description: If enabled, obnoxious flashing will only affect the current window (requires a workspace to be open).

terminalIdleMonitor.excludePatterns.description: Comma-separated list of terminal titles to exclude from monitoring (e.g., 'npm: watch*', 'debug').

terminalIdleMonitor.onlyMonitorActive.description: Only monitor the terminal currently visible. Background terminals will be ignored.

terminalIdleMonitor.showTerminateButton.description: Show a button to terminate/close the terminal in alerts.

terminalIdleMonitor.useSigInt.description: When terminating, send Ctrl+C (SIGINT) instead of closing the terminal window.

terminalIdleMonitor.autoTerminateEnabled.description: Automatically terminate idle terminals after a specific duration.

terminalIdleMonitor.autoTerminateTimeout.description: Time in minutes before an idle terminal is automatically terminated.

terminalIdleMonitor.hardTerminateRetries.description: Number of Ctrl+C retries before a hard termination (closing the terminal) occurs. Only used if Gentle Termination is enabled.

scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
